title: Video: Soft Bullets – Hyperreality
content: Using clips sent into them by fans, Bournemouth / Portland two piece Soft Bullets have crafted this rather lovely video for Hyperreality. Awash with grainy, slow motion footage, it fits the languid mood of the accompanying track. So the Radiohead inspiration is fairly prominent, most noticeably in the strained, poignantly imperfect vocals, yet on sheer quality alone, it wouldn’t appear to out of place on In Rainbows. Check out the video belo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
